participant_2.background:
I work in a library, helping people find information and resources.
i ride a bike.
pink is my favorite color.
i love to watch ted talks.
my inspirations are alexander mcqueen and coco chanel.

content.text: Hey! What do you do for work?
I work in a library, helping people find information and resources. It's a great job and I get to meet all sorts of interesting people.
Wow, that sounds really interesting! I've always loved libraries. What's your favorite thing about it?
I love helping people find what they're looking for. It's so satisfying to see someone's face light up when they finally find the book they've been searching for.
That's amazing! I know I'd be so grateful if someone helped me find the perfect book.
It's my pleasure! I'm always happy to help.
Do you have any hobbies outside of work?
I love to ride my bike. It's a great way to get exercise and see the city. I also love to watch TED talks. They're always so inspiring.
I love TED talks too! I love learning new things and they're a great way to do that.
Me too! I like how they can cover so many different topics.
Yeah, they're really versatile.
Do you have any favorite TED talks?
I have a few. I really liked the one about the power of storytelling. It was really inspiring.
That sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
I will!
So, what are you up to this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go for a bike ride or watch some TED talks.
Sounds like a good plan. I might do the same thing.
Awesome! We can compare notes later.
Sounds good
